Key Match Events: Russell Westbrook got the putback rebound after his teammate DeAndre Jordan missed a free throw, and the moment went viral on social media.
Post-Match Reflections: Russell Westbrook said that he told his former teammate Ivica Zubac that he was going to get the rebound and there's nothing he could do about it.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Denver Nuggets defeated the LA Clippers on Wednesday night, tying the season series at two games a piece.
Others: Russell Westbrook finished with 19 points, eight assists, and six rebounds in the game.
